description: Header Navigation & Profile Reorganisation - Add Briefs and Investigations to header nav, update profile page with separate sections and stats for each feature.

userStories.title: Update header navigation with Briefs and Investigations links
userStories.description: As a visitor, I want to see both Briefs and Investigations in the header so I can discover and access either feature.
acceptanceCriteria: Header nav shows 'Briefs' link to /briefs (replaces 'Browse Briefs')
Header nav shows 'Investigations' link to /accountability
'Briefs' appears before 'Investigations' in the nav order
Both links use existing nav styling (text-muted-foreground, hover:text-foreground)
Both links hidden on mobile (hidden sm:block pattern)
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add investigations count fetch to profile page
userStories.description: As a developer, I need to fetch the user's investigation count to display in stats.
acceptanceCriteria: Add query to fetch count from accountability_investigations table
Query filters by user_id matching current user
Count stored in stats state alongside existing brief counts
Handle case where table doesn't exist gracefully (count = 0)
Typecheck passes

userStories.title: Expand profile stats grid to include investigations
userStories.description: As a user, I want to see my investigation count alongside brief stats.
acceptanceCriteria: Stats grid shows 4 items: Briefs Generated, Briefs Saved, Investigations, Feedback Given
Investigations stat uses Scale icon from lucide-react
Grid layout: 2x2 on mobile (grid-cols-2), 4-col on desktop (sm:grid-cols-4)
Investigation count displays correctly
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add Briefs section to profile quick links
userStories.description: As a user, I want a dedicated Briefs section grouping my brief-related actions.
acceptanceCriteria: New section with heading 'Briefs' and FileText icon
Contains two quick links: 'My Briefs' (/profile/history) and 'Saved Briefs' (/profile/saved)
Each link shows count badge (briefsGenerated, briefsSaved)
Section appears above the Account section
Uses existing quick link card styling (rounded-xl, bg-ivory-100, hover:bg-ivory-200)
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill

userStories.title: Add Investigations section to profile quick links
userStories.description: As a user, I want a dedicated Investigations section on my profile.
acceptanceCriteria: New section with heading 'Investigations' and Scale icon
Contains quick link: 'My Investigations' linking to /accountability
Link shows investigation count badge
If count is 0, shows secondary text 'Start your first investigation'
Section appears between Briefs section and Account section
Uses existing quick link card styling
Typecheck passes
Verify in browser using dev-browser skill
